title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2628/93 of 24 September 1993 amending the indicative ceilings fixed by Regulation (EEC) No 1112/93 in the framework of the supplementary trade mechanism for trade with Spain and Portugal in the beef and veal sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2628/93 of 24 September 1993 amending the indicative ceilings fixed by Regulation (EEC) No 1112/93 in the framework of the supplementary trade mechanism for trade with Spain and Portugal in the beef and veal sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. the Annexes to Regulation (EEC) No 1112/93 are hereby replaced by the Annex hereto;
2. Applications for STM licences may be re-submitted from the date of entry into force of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 September 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 113, 7. 5. 1993, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 232, 15. 9. 1993, p. 19.
ANNEX
'ANNEX I
